topic.label: News Topic
topic.description: Configure the news topics you are interested in to filter news.

collection.label: News Website Collection
collection.description: The news website collection is used to access global news websites.

website.label: News Website
website.description: The URLs of global news websites obtained from the news website collection.

critique.label: News Critique
critique.description: Configure AI services compatible with OpenAI API for the analysis and evaluation of news content.

translate.label: News Translation
translate.description: Configure translation services for translating news content into other languages.

service.label: Remote service
service.description: Enable cloud-deployed services for global news crawling, and use this feature when the local network is poor.

remote_service.web_not_support: The web client does not support remote service configuration.

validate.invalid_host: Please enter a valid service host.
validate.invalid_token: Please enter a valid service token.

validate.invalid_api_key: Please enter a valid api key.
